website_summaries.verdict: Offers the best of both worlds: value and cleaning power with a dash of convenience.
pros: Pod format makes these pacs easy to pop into the washer without the need for measuring
No chance of spilling or wasting detergent
Pacs are easy to store and provide effective cleaning power
Capable of removing most stains without trouble
Users also comment positively on the array of scents offered
cons: Reports of pods not dissolving completely in the washer

website_summaries.verdict: Backed by a reliable laundry detergent brand, these pods do a solid job cleaning clothes, coming in a tub of 81 pods.
pros: These pods prevent a mess and are convenient to pop in your washing machine, boasting a pre-measured amount of detergent
These come in a convenient bucket with a twist-off cap
Accompanied by a fresh and clean scent
One pod cleans a standard load
cons: Pods must be put in washing machine prior to clothes or they may not completely dissolve

customer_reviews.title: Less product for the same price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 81 count of pods in February (left side in photo) and just received our new order (right side) today. Notice how much smaller the new container is. It also weighs less. At first I thought - oh it weighs less because the container is smaller. But out of curiousity I thought I would compared the two. And I am disappointed to learn that we are now getting less for the same price. And that is how inequity happens - getting less and less and ultimately paying more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time unless you want to rewash the Unwashed PODS off your clothing.
customer_reviews.text: Never again, I bought these thinking they would be a change from the normal pour in and set and forget. Was I wrong.... The PODS that keep the detergent in do not dissolve and when it comes time to get my laundry folded I find the PODS half dissolved sticking to my clothing. At first I thought I was sticking to much laundry in my front loader, so I put half a load in... Still the same problem. I tried hot and cold water and even throw them in the drum like instructions state. I will never ever ever again buy these PODS. Horrible idea on Tides end who ever designed these.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey Lukaszka

customer_reviews.title: Love Tid Pods
customer_reviews.text: I've loved these since I started using them years ago. So much simpler to use, less mess, and less chance of wasting product than from a pour-bottle. I have only ever needed 1 pod per load, even large loads, and never had an issue with items not being clean (but I have a standard washing machine, not one that has a super-massive basin). Additionally, I have never had them stain clothing or not dissolve properly. I toss them in before the machine is loaded with clothing or water. A bit pricier than a bottle of detergent, but they're even more worth it when you can get them on a deal! (And no, I don't eat them. Strictly laundering purposes only.)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Regularly stains clothes
customer_reviews.text: Fed up and switching back to regular liquid detergent. Pods are a nice idea, but they need to fix their design. This regularly leaves bluish or dark stains on clothes. Tired of having clothes stained and having to re wash, sometimes multiple washes, to remove. If I'm lucky. I've had to throw away good clothes for stains not coming out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scantlin

customer_reviews.title: Pods sticks to your shirt
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing its instructions it says you can use any water temperature. I usually use hot water to do my laundry and it doesn't say anything that you can't use hot water for pods. After the laundry, I was surprised that the plastic residue sticked on my under armour shirt which costs $25 and to my wife's old navy shirt which costs around $25+. I love tide pods but definitely this experience kind of scared me because I have precious clothes that i don't want to be damaged. Will be switching to different brands
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use til they all glob together
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, easy to pop in and clean. Simplified the whole laundry process. But one day I looked down and all the pods were attached to one another, and I couldn’t use any of them without spilling the insides of all the nearby attached pods. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 20 PODS STUCK TOGETHER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of these pods & using a lot less detergent, but had at least 20 pods not cut apart and it says on the container of stuck together don't break apart, guess the manufacture thinks you can buy the 81 pods and throw out the ones that were not separated, so you will only get 60 usable pods.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Helped bad smell in clothes
customer_reviews.text: We have a HE washing Machine. it is supposed to wash clothes good, but trying get the smell out of the clothes is hard. this product actually helped get the grungy smell out of the low water wash cycle. The Clothes come out of the wash smelling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Really not useful
customer_reviews.text: I subscribed this in the first place, thinking that would save my money. But I was terribly wrong!! This thing is so difficult to wash away in any typical washing machines. It always stick my clothes and it's so hard to separate them that I have to actually tear my clothes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tianrui Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First disappointment with tide. Is this product a knock off. I washed my stuff twice thinking maybe I spaced and forgot to put pod in the wash the first time, but even after two washed it was like never washed. Smelled like dirty clothes! Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Must have been moisture in the package, they were all stuck together or popped when received. Huge mess. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Diroll

customer_reviews.title: They're HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the machines in my building are to blame but these pods never dissolved properly. The plastic part was always stuck on my clothes and had to rewash several times for it to fully come off. Either that or let the items soak and scrub aggressively. They're HORRIBLE!!! I bought another brand and have not had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: JGGaia

customer_reviews.title: The New Design Ruined My Clothes
customer_reviews.text: Tide Pods recently changed their design and now they are not disingrating, they leave a thick melted plastic residue into the clothes that can't get out if you put it into the dryer. I've put them in different ways and its still happening. Tide needs to go back to the old design.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: These work so well to remove stain and odors from laundry and I love that you don’t waste detergent because the “dose” is right every time. There are plenty of things where I can’t tell much difference between a bargain or store brand and a “premium” brand, but this isn’t one of them...this product is really worth the extra cost in my opinion. I notice a big difference in how much better it works. Keep them on a shelf so kids don’t snack on them and you’re fine...not sure what the issues with them causing so much concern really is.
customer_reviews.author: CeesMom

customer_reviews.title: First detergent pods - Not as great
customer_reviews.text: I usually use powder but I want to try the pods. My washing machine is little old so these pods actually damaged my clothes and not able to take detergent out of the plastic bag after washed. It stayed in the washing machine. Thus, my clothes were not clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Trusted, smells great
customer_reviews.text: Tide Pods are an essential part of my household. I have been using them for several years now with zero complaints or issues. They leave my clothes smelling great and also take care of any stains or grime on my clothes. I also like to take these along when I travel - I can use them in any machine no matter where I go. Just place one (or two) under the clothes and Tide takes care of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fully dissolve! 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: Tide Pods do not always dissolve completely in our washing machine, even when we are sure to keep water temp on warm and make sure our HE washer runs for a long enough cycle. Many of our whites get stained blue with detergent that didn’t rinse off (the blue washes off during the next cycle, but still) and other clothes are left with sticky residue all over them, causing some of the clothes to get stuck to itself and scrunched up, or stuck to other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I love how easy they are to use and they make my clothes smell great. It beats having to carry three separate products up and down my stairs when I do laundry ( I live in an apartment and the washers are in the basement). With this, I just need one small pod and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Tide Pods are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tide - I have used it for many years and have always had great results! I am now using the Tide Pods and love how easy they are to use. They do an amazing job on my laundry and are budget friendly. I order through Subscribe and Save and get a discount there!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to this scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is much too strong - I’ve used Tide for over 40 yrs - will need to switch to another scent - it’s hard when you can’t smell them before you purchase the product and the scents are constantly changing and out of stock
customer_reviews.author: Lori Matthews

customer_reviews.title: BIG CHUNK OF SUCK TIDE PODS
customer_reviews.text: Big chunk of pods where stuck together and had to use more in wash cycle because they do not pull apar easily without oozing, figures. Dually noted for the shipping price but other than that, seems like the ones I buy in the store, money saver atm
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Go for the Convenience, Stay for the Subscribe & Save Savings
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best option for laundry detergent out there. I've always been a Tide person because it simply does a better job at getting laundry clean and preventing stains from setting in. It took me a while to come over to using Pods because I was always the person willing to pour the detergent into the cap to save a few cents each load. But I tried it once and I've been converted, it's just too convenient. Almost encourages me to do laundry, almost. Subscribe and Save and compare at your local grocery store, I'd be willing to bet money that you will save by ordering through Amazon, just like any number of other products.
customer_reviews.author: ZO

customer_reviews.title: Scent is way too strong
customer_reviews.text: This product gets clothes clean enough but I found the scent overpowering and had to run the load again twice more to get the scent down to a tolerable level. TIDE WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS? Back off the perfume for crying out loud. I used to love Tide but you've really ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant invention
customer_reviews.text: Pods are so easy to use! They are convenient because they are in ore-Doss age size, they are easy to carry a few to our laundry room in our building's basement without lugging a giant liquid dish washing container. They are effective. They are our new standard and I even ordered an Amazon Dash button for replenishing these!
customer_reviews.author: Sahkira

customer_reviews.title: EASY AND EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these pods over and over again. I use to use the powders or liquid containers for my laundry but these are so much faster and easier to use. I usually have to reach for the powder or liquid container, which is heavy, and then pour the right amount in the cup. This was burdensome because of the weight and the mess it sometimes left. I find the cost to be worth the less effort that I have to put into getting the detergent into the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes gets stuck in the rubber ling of washing machine
customer_reviews.text: The pods are convenient and work well most of the time however two big disadvantages will keep me from buying this again - one the pods come in fixed sizes so the detergent amount is quantised and if I want to do just a few clothes or wash a hat or something I need the liquid detergent. Two the pods sometime get stuck in the rubber lining of the washing machine door (despite following all the instructions) and occasionally they also leave sticky residue on clothes making extra work for me which is what i was trying to avoid with the pods in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Chockalingam Senthilnathan

customer_reviews.title: I love these tide pods
customer_reviews.text: So convenient and smells great. My laundry smells so good. I will continue using Tide pods forever. They don’t leak. I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Pimpers83

customer_reviews.title: Think you......
customer_reviews.text: I think you could get the same cleaning from any product Tide makes. Whatever the formula is does the job. I DO NOT LIKE the container at all. I have small hands and not a lot of strength. Removing the "cap" of this presentation of Tide is a bitch. I've decided that the best approach: have a tool dedicated to the location of your washer. A flat head screwdriver or a butter knife will do. Read the cautions...... I signed up for auto delivery but I suspect I'll have to switch to every other month, however after I read the directions, I discovered that the manufacturer suggests using two per load. Hmmm
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Stuck together
customer_reviews.text: Several pods were stuck together. I could separate some of them. I’m not sure if it was from rough transit or condensation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, the best detergent
customer_reviews.text: for a while, we have been using the generic -big (membership) store brand and were happy with it. This was on sale with a percentage off coupon for subscribe and save, so we tried it. i was very eager to try it while the other container still half full, the difference is huge. tide cleans better, smells nicer, and the clothes stay fresher longer. now the other half full container gonna set tight for the next 80 loads of laundry...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept hate when they get stuck together
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of the pod what I don’t like is when they get stuck together it’s a waste because you can’t separate them without having them explode on you and running under water defeats the purpose. Wish they could improve the pod package
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Oh dang, that's soft
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Tide liquid detergent for about a year now. Maybe I wasn't using enough of it but usually my clothes just smelled like tap water when the washer machine finished. For nice smells, I just assumed that's what the Bounce dryer sheets were for. After trying a load with Tide Pods, everything came out soft and smelling really nice. I'm probably not going to switch back to the liquid detergent at this point. As a side note, these things look and smell delicious. Definitely needs to be kept out of reach of children or the mentally ill.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Having issues
customer_reviews.text: First container I got of the pods were fine. The second, not so much (was on auto delivery but no longer because of this issue). The pods are ruining clothes. They aren't completely dissolving and are leaving globs of messes on clothing that is hard to get off. I tried adjusting the load size to smaller size and still doing the same. Won't buy pods any longer. Can't take a chance of things getting ruined anymore. Bummer too, because it sure was nice to use instead of trying to lug the jugs.
customer_reviews.author: R Loomis

customer_reviews.title: PODS WERE BROKEN OPENalf
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these Pod Tide and have been very disappointed. I got half way down and the pods are all broken. You reach down to grab a pod and all you get is a bunch of soap, Very, very unhappy. Not sure if I will continue with them or not. I ordered these for ease but it turned out badly for me. Great product, just need to make sure that somehow the pods don't explode or what ever they do. I'm sure I am not the only one to have this problem, needs to be addressed,
customer_reviews.author: ajb5456

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!!! The best, words cannot describe!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved clean clothes, I mean like fanatically. Well finally I broke down and bought this soap for my worn clothing. I was skeptical at first. Would this little cute ball filled with soap be strong enough to clean my worn clothes? Would it have what it takes to get the armpit odor out of my worn shirt? You bet! And in spades! the technology of the ball when submerged in water breaks apart and dispersed soap into said worn clothes. Genius!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dikthompson

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent and hard to come off
customer_reviews.text: This stuff may clean well but smells awful. It has a strong and nauseating sweet toxic scent that is literally sickening so I can not recommend. Laundry should never smell like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tatia

customer_reviews.title: They work, but they aren't fun to get out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: Pods are all stuck together like they spent too long in a hot warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jack G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I hope this is not a trend
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these well over a dozen times throughout the years. I also tend to order things well in advance. My last order came in and I did not open it for a couple of month. Unfortunately these pods must have stored somewhere very hot before shipping. All them were stuck together. This is first time it has happened, hence the 3 stars and not 1.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Can not melt in water at all
customer_reviews.text: I use less than 10 pods, and this is the third time it dyes my clothes/ sheets and have residue on side. i didn’t pay attention at the first time, and found it actually hurts your skin if what you wear is with residue. Not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Lin

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived and was sealed shut but cannot be used. There was soap everywhere inside of the container and when the pods get wet it ruins the rest of them because they start to disolve when wet. I attempted to return indicating the product was damaged upon arrival and this is against policy apparently. I will be unsubscribing from subscribe and save because I don’t want to risk receiving another damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Skaparas

customer_reviews.title: Love this way to get my Favorite Detergent TIDE PODS !!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 3rd shipment of Tide Pods and am so very pleased with this opportunity to purchase on line andget my Tide ( 81 PODS ) delivered every two months on a regular cycle !!! I have used Tide for 50 years and will keep on . It is the greatest and I thank Amazon for this wonderful offer. I recommend this sign up for delivery to everyone. Thanks AMAZON. !! Thanks TIDE !!
customer_reviews.author: scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Ok- I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: I got these with a big coupon. I normally would not spend extra money on a pod detergent, but I must say these are really fun. They are squishy and feel great in my hands. They are fun and easy, just toss one in. The thing that impressed me the most is they clean really well, and the scent is really nice. Clothing that had stains forever magically became white . Towels look amazing. These do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Long last fresh smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have discovered over the years you get what you pay for in laundry soap. While I love the scents from Gain, the good smell from my clothes just doesn’t last. Maybe a day or two I can smell it but not much longer. With these, I kept smelling something really good and couldn’t figure out what it was. It ended up being the undershirt I was wearing and I could smell it over my shirt and sweater!! Super powerful scent but to me in the best way possible!! I’ll take clothes out of the drawer weeks later and still smell the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: These Tide Pods Smell great in the Spring Meadow scent
customer_reviews.text: These Tide Pods Smell great in the Spring Meadow scent. I think it it wonderful that tide has managed to put laundry detergent, stain lifter, and fabric softner into one pod. These little pods are very convenient for my family and myself, just pop one or two in, depending on size and start the load. The scent stays on the clothing, even through the drying process, which I love. Overall, I would highly recomend these, and they keep very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M.

customer_reviews.title: Bleach spots on dark clothes
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy this again because the pods when they break up bleach out my black lingerie. For some reason the bleach explodes on any of your dark clothes and totally ruins them. This did not happen with Persia pods. I’ve tried the tide twice now and it’s definitely the type that does it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smells Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The pods are easy to use and they clean well. I would never buy them again because they smell horrible and gives me a very light headache. I don’t know what they were trying to make it smell like but it just smells like a bad mix of chemicals. Going to use them anyway, because otherwise they would be wasted, but never will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: I’m STILL using my first container of these! I would have bought at least two containers if I was still using my old detergent. You can’t get easier than this! Just make sure you’re putting the pod in at the bottom or else it may get stuck to clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Burns

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these! Great wash, nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: The heavy duty round container is a space waster and a bit of an overkill, but they are not going to get inadvertently stepped on, or eaten by a toddler. There is a taped, then complicated lid that you press in tabs and turn, so nobody tiny would be able to get to them, unless you leave the lid off. The quality of the wash is incredible (I also have s new fancy machine), so I am very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great stain removal and scent!
customer_reviews.text: After using g this product for years I can truly attest that it is the best detergent for getting out those stains that slip through my eyes The sent is great but not overpowering and remains fresh for weeks. Combined with my downy it is perfect. Ease of use is fantastic also. If I use liquid we tend to go through it way to fast as everyone else in the house seems to think every load needs the maximum amount. One towel gets the same amount as a full load. The pods stop this.
customer_reviews.author: Everett A Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap it dissolves on its own
customer_reviews.text: These pods actually wash clothes. They dissolve on their own which is nice because I hate dumping the liquid form into my washing machine. Now I can touch with my fingers and toss in instead of having to grab the measuring cup, which is so gosh darn hard and time consuming. Overall I think I saved myself 00000000.3 seconds by switching to pods. Yaye me!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nickens

customer_reviews.title: Leaking in container
customer_reviews.text: Received today and some of the pods were bursted inside the container and the detergent was leaking inside the Prime box. The shipping box had a wet spot on the bottom. I'm using now for the first time so I can't comment on how well It cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: Clean & fresh. Excellent detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of just throwing in 1 to 2 pods per load and forget about it. No more measuring. No more messy liquid that spills and leaks down the bottle or powder going everywhere. ! They smell really nice and one is enough for a big load of laundry. The only dislike I have is the price. Once in a while I can get a few dollars off, but its still pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean so well.
customer_reviews.text: Don't feel like the clothes get as clean as with normal liquid detergent. I am finding myself using 4-5 per load just to get clothing clean. When I have to consistently use more, then the value of this is awful. The packaging doesn't always melt even in hot water, I have had to throw whole loads back in the washing machine just to wash off the packaging from the pods off the clothes. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MamaGriz

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Pods
customer_reviews.text: The plastic that surrounds the liquid has now destroyed 3 pieces of clothing. Every wash it’s like it sticks to one thing and the plastic molds into ur fabric. It also has ruined 3 pairs of socks, 2 towels and one pair of champion sweat pants via purple stain. Buy this in the store not off amazon. Believe these are bootleg
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flanzer

customer_reviews.title: 4 in 1 is worth the extra
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend the 4 in 1 over these. The small difference makes all the difference in the scent of your laundry. They still work fine for general cleaning and pods are easy to use over traditional soaps just the added extra in the 4 in 1 makes a huge difference for lasting freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Family shopper

customer_reviews.title: 4.4 star is exaggerated
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's convenient that's true. But some pods are defective and will not melt in the water properly and they will stick to your clothes. I've been using it for a year but I'll go back to liquid detergents. Only this would be enough for me to give 1 star. Other than that everything was fine. BEWARE the pictures are real in reviews! You'll lose your favorite clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Baris A.

customer_reviews.title: it's wonderful and works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time...it's wonderful and works perfect. I ordered it from Amazon Prime because I don't have to pay postage, and really, the real reason is that I don't have to lug it home from the store anymore. I have leg problems and it's really nice to get things delivered to my door. The Tide product is, as usual, simply the best there is. I wouldn't use any other clothes washing soap.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Clumped together
customer_reviews.text: I always use tide products and have for years but this time I was very disappointed. The pods were tacky and stuck together. I had to be very careful pulling them apart so they wouldn't break. The price is a little steep for the pods to be clumped together and some were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Tide Pods are a Commodity, It's the Delivery We're After
customer_reviews.text: Tide Pods is the laundry detergent of choice in our house. The quality is an assumption, as is the consistency of the product's formula: They're Tide Pods. That's it. The difference is the scheduled delivery we now receive through Amazon. The convenience and dependability of re-supply allows us to worry about one less thing in the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zaccaria

customer_reviews.title: Love these pods for laundry
customer_reviews.text: They do their job and only use two when the machine is filled to the brim with something heavy like towels or blankets. Saves a lot of time and energy, as just throw them in the machine and they take care of business. Easy to store, easy to use, Read a number of reviews , and chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Kate's Careful Reviews Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.  Cleans better.
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting scent and does a great job getting the clothes cleaned. Much easier ordering online than going to target for it and leaving with a $150 bill and no laundry detergent. 🤭🤪
customer_reviews.author: HANNNNIE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but I have come around to liking these. The scent may not be as strong as the liquid form but my clothes are just as clean. And it's easy for kids to use when they start doing their own laundry. I never really have to deal with spilled laundry detergent which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New formula, they stink like sulfur!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pods are different, they stink and smell like sulfur. Maybe a new formula? I noticed the pod packs looked different also, more see through.
customer_reviews.author: Panthera75

customer_reviews.title: Like the concept-but not the same as detergent
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to pods with my new washer. The sample was twice the size of these pods that I purchased. In order to complete my laundry for a family of 6;I am using 3 pods - 4 pods just to have the scent on the clothes. Will return to my Tide liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: came broken
customer_reviews.text: usually when I order this, I have no complaints. This time around, the packaging was cracked and they burst inside of it and inside the box it came in, and on to everything else in the box. I love tide pods but the packaging has to get better!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I like it (:
customer_reviews.text: it removes odor from workout and smells really good! I haven’t really washed stained or really dirty clothes yet but it’s easy to wash your daily clothes with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: The pods are best for my family and I so we do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Tide is the only laundry detergent that actually cleans your clothes.I do not compromise my laundry detergent or my dish detergent. The pods are best for my family and I so we do not waste detergent. Safety lids for children. Excellent item. Can be stored in the drawer underneath those new washing machines. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great for clothes...not for eating
customer_reviews.text: Tide pods are just more popular than others but are they really better than others? Not really in terms of value but they do perform well every time you use them. Just don't be a moron and try to eat them which is why they now come in a locking top which is just the state of our new generations upon us.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt_Retired_Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Get the Subscription
customer_reviews.text: Yo, this is a subscription of mine and I will say it be right on time Everytime. Plus you know what it is with Tide. I personally mix this with Persil liquid washing powder and my clothes be fresh as hell. I find myself just smelling my son when he near me. Weird I know.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Old!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this a couple months ago - went to use it last night and it must be expired I had too use 2 pods per 1 average size laundry
customer_reviews.author: Ruth T.

customer_reviews.title: makes your life easier
customer_reviews.text: laundry has never been easier or cleaner. I thought these PODS were a rip off when they first came out, but for a busy mom, it's worth it. I absolutely love TIDE and the easy of use. I do about 10 loads of laundry a week so yeah I think they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: A good value for a good product that does its job while keeping clothes smelling fresh. Wish the eco laundry detergent alternatives provided such fresh smells. The smell is the predominant reason we use them in conjunction with the seventh generation detergent. Otherwise, we'd rather skip the chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: jL

customer_reviews.title: better to get in the store
customer_reviews.text: think this is something to nit order in the summer.... some leaked and got on the rest of my order as well as now all the pods are compromised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not as tasty as normal tide pods... JOKING! Seriously though sometimes they don’t dissolve all the way, especially on the cool water setting. Directions say use 2 for large loads but that’s not enough. They aren’t very concentrated or strong at all. Sometimes clothes are still dirty after washing 😠
customer_reviews.author: Pat and Kai

customer_reviews.title: Get it! You’ll end up liking to do laundry - I do!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! Laundry isn’t one of my favorite things to do but my Tide helps make it a positive endeavor. The dirtiest of clothes will come out not only fresh smelling but also very, very clean! I’ve used other, less expensive detergents but nothing quite cleans like these Tide Pods.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle W.

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Of course they’re easy to use, toss one in the washing machine with your dirty laundry. Thank goodness it didn’t ask for flavor, I didn’t jump on that bandwagon. I’m still shook I survived my teenage years. I’m sure I should have fallen victim to natural selection more than once. So me leaving a review for Tide Pods is a miracle in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnalynn Beal

customer_reviews.title: Love the pods
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these pods for some time. I love these things. Convenience, scent, no mess are some of the top reasons I chose Tide pods. Today was the first time there were broken pods in the container. I can’t figure how many were broken but they are all stuck together and it’s quite a mess. Kinda useless. I figure in a couple of days I’ll have regular liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: morsel81

customer_reviews.title: A lot less messier and more convenient
customer_reviews.text: These pods are priced more expensively than the liquid detergent. But the ability to just throw a pod or two into the washing machine without making a huge mess far outweigh the cost. They're great. Just don't let the kids eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Bui

customer_reviews.title: Tide Pods
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient and do a great job cleaning your laundry. I have them on a monthly order list and you just receive them and never have to worry about running out. You also get a better price from Amazon when ordering this way. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I love his Tide cleans our clothes and the pods come in very handy. This scent is especially nice. It keeps the clothes smelling good even after coming out of the dryer, The only complaint I have is the cost and that sometimes they stick together. However the good outstays the bad and I will continue to use and order this product!
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Okay but little pain for me!
customer_reviews.text: Guess this stuff must be great? Is light to carry home if purchasing at store! Much better than big jug of liquid! My issue is I always seem to have wet hands when I put in container to grab! Then more than I want gets wet and all becomes a mess!! Yuck! But guess it is just me!!
customer_reviews.author: Katch

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I mean I got what I wanted for the same price of a container that carries like 40 pods so this is honestly a great deal especially if you set up a subscription for it, every two months I a get a new container of 80 for $17 thats not a bad deal at all
customer_reviews.author: kenshi masaki

customer_reviews.title: Pods ruin clothes
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, but they don’t always melt and when they don’t, they ruin clothes either by leaving plastic on the clothes or a dark blue stain. Want to love them but can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrtal

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Subscribe & save is the best!! Love these - so easy to use- keep away from kids.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Welch

customer_reviews.title: waste of money these DO NOT DISSOLVE IN WASH
customer_reviews.text: My laundry is continuously coming out with the pod still melted into the fabric. These DO NOT DISSOLVE IN THE WASH! WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Clothes do not come clean
customer_reviews.text: My clothes have been smelling funny since I started using them. The other night I washed clothes, and while putting them away I was smelling every piece of clothing... The socks and underwear still smelt like they haven't been washed at all. I will not be using the pods again. 🤢 Smelt like they sat in water for an hr then got dried..
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and makes a mean mixed drink
customer_reviews.text: If you thought that headline was serious...please don't use that way. They do a good job cleaning. Seems like once every container or so, we get some that don't dissolve correctly. Not a big deal, but it can be a pain to rewash when this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors dad

customer_reviews.title: BEST Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This production is FANTASTIC! LOVE having Subscribe & Save deliver everyday products directly to my door. Eliminates heavy transferring from store shelves to carriage, carriage to checkout, checkout to car, car into house. Excellent for those with disabilities.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyD

customer_reviews.title: Baby safe detergent that lets you put a load in easily with one hand!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for avoiding the mess and measuring of detergent liquid, especially when you have a baby in one arm. This is my favorite scent. I wash all baby items with it and he has never had an allergy or skin reaction. No need to buy overpriced baby detergent if you don't need it and then you can combine all the laundry in one! Mom win and baby approved.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of little toddler!

customer_reviews.title: Switched from traditional detergent
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try tide pods because I wasn’t sure they would get our laundry as clean as the traditional laundry detergent. I was pleasantly surprised! The sent is fresh and the directions are easy to follow and we have had no trouble with the packets dissolving. Our family has made the switch to pods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't dissolve completely and ruin the load
customer_reviews.text: These pods don't dissolve completely and leave one article of clothing with sticky residue and so soapy it has to be rewashed, while nothing else gets thoroughly cleaned. Would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent and it is very convenient to use in the pods option. The only issue I sometimes have is that the envelope of the pod will not dissolve properly and will stick to my cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Segura

customer_reviews.title: Tide Pods
customer_reviews.text: I started using pods about 3 months ago and I like how easy their are and they do a very good job cleaning clothes. The deal was GREAT and should last several months. Tide has been my laundry detergent for a long time. NO COMPLAINTS.
customer_reviews.author: Red Devil

customer_reviews.title: The liquid is better
customer_reviews.text: These pods are not worth it at all. I put 5 in a large load of laundry and the lady at the laundry mat still had to put more detergent in the machine. The liquid is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl

customer_reviews.title: Hives :(
customer_reviews.text: As some of the other reviewers, I also got hives. I do not have sensitive skin or any known allergies. The hives were on body in the shape of the tank top I washed, and nothing else had changed in my routine so I’m sure it’s from This. Not to mention that when I put my clothes back in the wash, I accidentally touched my face before washing my hands so now that’s itching to. - Sent from the couch while waiting for hubby to return with antihistamines
customer_reviews.author: Huma E.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this product. It has a nice scent without being overpowering and it has a very good cleaning potential. 99.9% of the time...with very rare exception....my clothes come out perfectly clean. Thanks for carrying them, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: pursuetruth

customer_reviews.title: These Don’t Dissolve - Check Your Pants!
customer_reviews.text: Every single wash results in a gross residue left on my clothes. Sometimes I don’t notice right away, and then discover I’ve been walking around with a Tide Pod Snot on my pants for half of the work day. I read online that, to correct this, I’m supposed to dissolve the pod in water before using. What a ridiculous waste of time. Back to liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Kept clothes very clean
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought online during pandemic when everything was gone in big box stores and grocery store. Love the smell loved the product. Just don’t normally purchase such small quantity. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and the convenience and non-messiness of the pods. I just wish Tide would make this scent, or others, in a tide sport version. Tide sport is the only thing that works on my stinky clothes, but for my normal non-sweaty clothes I prefer this detergent scent
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne M Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: One pod in does the trick for a full load. Much easier than dealing with measuring cups or scoops. It makes laundry much more tolerable. Smells nice, no weird skin reactions. Cleans quite well. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

product_meta.title: Tide Pods 3 in 1, Laundry Detergent Pacs, Spring Meadow Scent, 81 Count
product_meta.description: Style:Spring MeadowTide PODS laundry detergent pacs offer surprisingly powerful clean in 1 step. Combining super concentrated detergent, extra odor fighters, and extra stain removers, each capsule cleans, freshens, and rejuvenates clothes for brighter brights and whiter whites. Small yet powerful, Tide PODS delivers 10x cleaning power* in a convenient, pre-measured unit dose form. Also, thanks to the special film and HE Turbo technology with quick-collapsing suds, the capsules dissolve completely in all temperatures and do not produce excess suds. The Spring Meadow scent is infused with with fresh floral notes to help keep your clothes smelling great. More than just a liquid in a pouch, Tide PODS delivers a surprisingly powerful clean in 1 step. * Stain Removal of 1 dose vs. 10X doses of the leading liquid bargain brand
feature_bullets: Tide PODS consist of up to 90% active ingredients, so you can be sure that you’re paying for clean not for water
10x the cleaning power* (*Stain Removal of 1 dose vs. 10X doses of the leading liquid bargain brand)
Reveal our brightest clean yet for brighter brights and whiter whites
3 in 1 technology: detergent, stain remover, color protector
Dissolves in both hot & cold water. Keep out of reach of children
Its Spring Meadow scent is infused with fresh floral notes to help keep your family’s clothes smelling great

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
